spida2

New version of the ‘spida’ package developed for the Summer Programme in Data Analysis at York University and for SCS and ICPSR workshops on Mixed Models and Longitudinal Data Analysis # Installation devtools::install_github(‘gmonette/spida2’) # Development version devtools::install_github(‘gmonette/spida2@devel’)
